name: Ext_R4_CarePlan_ac_outcomeReference
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.CarePlan.activity.outcomeReference for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.outcomeReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Details of the outcome or action resulting from the activity.  The reference to an "event" resource, such as Procedure or Encounter or Observation, is the result/outcome of the activity itself.  The activity can be conveyed using CarePlan.activity.detail OR using the CarePlan.activity.reference (a reference to a “request” resource).
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.outcomeReference` maps to R5 `CarePlan.activity.performedActivity`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
